node: Patient with documented involuntary weight loss
content: Patient with documented involuntary weight loss

children.content: Complete history and physical, including mental status, examination. Review diet and appetite. Update routine indicated cancer screening tests

children.node: Preexisting chronic illness known to cause IWL
children.content: Preexisting chronic illness known to cause IWL
Review prescription and over-the-counter medications for anorectic side effects

children.node: History or examination findings suggestive of illnesses known to cause IWL
children.content: History or examination findings suggestive of illnesses known to cause IWL
Focus evaluation directed by abnormal findings

children.node: No history or examination findings suggestive of cause
children.content: No history or examination findings suggestive of cause
CBC, SMA 12, Urinalysis, Thyroid-stimulating hormone level, Chest x-ray, Stool guaiacs

More detailed psychosocial history: Screen for depression, anxiety, eating disorders. Screen for socioeconomic factors (poverty, lack of transportation, isolation). Screen for substance abuse. Consider food diary
